attributes.action: ensure that HMS Caroline stays in Belfast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the departure of the RNR in Belfast to 'HMS Hibernia', Belfast risks losing the 2nd oldest ship, and remaining survivor of the Battle of Jutland, in the Royal Navy.

We ask for the Government to help secure Her future, as a National Treasure, in Belfast.  This is the wish of many in the RN/RNR and General Public
